title: Renaming Slack Channels
content:
If you’d like to rename a Slack channel that is in one of the Simpli.fi Slack workspaces (engineering or simpli.fi-wide space), you can do so as a channel manager. Alternatively, anyone can submit a request to rename a channel by submitting a request in our Okta Access Portal. [PANEL] Video Tutorial (Recording) Follow to enter the request either through: Okta Access Request portal and locate the Slack Channel Renaming access request type , or… [Image] Use the Slack /access Slack Channel Renaming shortcut to search the Slack Channel Renaming access request type. [Image]

Page Labels: dws-user, virtual_agent
